mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence Capt. C. M. Stigleman Unsigned
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, July 16, 1861 to Capt. C. M. Stigleman, unsigned but handwriting is definitely that of A. J. Hoback at Little River, Va. Subject: recruits for the army, no luck. Volunteering at an end in the county. Also “Glorious news from the Southern Army.” 1 original piece with 4 written pages, 2 photocopied pages and 1 ¼ typed transcription.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
